snippet: Jo-Wilfried Tsonga has pulled out of next week's Wimbledon warmup tournament at Queen's Club because of an adductor injury....
lead_paragraph: Jo-Wilfried Tsonga has pulled out of next week's Wimbledon warmup tournament at Queen's Club because of an adductor injury.

headline.print_headline: Tsonga Pulls Out of Queen's Club Tournament With Injury
headline.main: Tsonga Pulls Out of Queen's Club Tournament With Injury
